title: Celebrity Endorsement Scams
description: A quick win: understand Celebrity Endorsement Scams.

hook.text: Celebrities promoted crypto tokens for undisclosed payments. Fans lost millions buying tokens that crashed to zero.

buildup.text: Kim Kardashian paid $1.26 million to settle with the SEC for promoting a token without disclosing she was paid.

discovery.text: Floyd Mayweather promoted multiple token sales. The SEC charged him with fraud for undisclosed paid endorsements.

twist.text: Deepfake videos of Elon Musk promoting fake crypto giveaways spread on YouTube. Even fake endorsements are effective.

climax.text: Celebrity involvement doesn't mean legitimacy. In crypto, fame is often used as a weapon against uninformed buyers.

punchline.text: If a celebrity promotes a token, ask who's paying them.

quiz.question: Why was Kim Kardashian fined by the SEC?
options: She promoted a token without disclosing she was paid to do so
